resources.string:
Thank you for choosing SMARTSTEGENO..!!


Following are the terms of on which we operate :-
 i. We do not take any of your private media accept the image you select
 ii. We dont offer any fees for the hiding of message.
 iii.Preserve original image.
 iv.No complexity in data hiding.
 v. Communication through this app is fully secured.
 
 Continue the use without any worries..!!

HEY SmartUser..!!


 Follow the guide given for fluent 
 use of application :-

 For encoding:
 Step 1:	 Make a secret key :-
 Give your key and encrypt it using 
 the application so that none can guess 
 it and total security of your message 
 is guaranteed!!
 Step 2:	 Lets start with encoding :-
 Choose the image where you would 
 like to conceal message
 Enter your secret message and the 
 encrypted key and hit encode 
 Give your few precious moment
 so that SMARTSTEGENO would 
 conceal the message
 Finally, save the encoded image.


 For sharing :-
 Enter email id and the encrypted 
 key of the receiver and hit share


 For decoding :-
 Step 1: Get your original key :-
 Firstly, enter the encrypted key 
 you received from sender.
 Hit, decrpyt key so that you 
 would get original key.
 Step 2: Lets start with decoding :-
 Goto decode section and choose the image given by sender and 
 enter secret key hit decode.
 Ta-DA..!! You will get the message sender wants to send you.
 You may proceed to 
 communicate without any queries..!!
